## Derivatives
### Returns function of derivative, have to plug in number after to find output of deriv.
``` {r}
myD <- function(f, h=.000001) {
  fPrime <- function(x) {((f(x+h)-f(x))/h)}
  return(fPrime)
}

#prime <- myD(sin)
#prime(3)

myD2 <- function(f, h=.0000001) {
  fPrime <- function(x) {((f(x+h)-f(x))/h)}  # OR myd(f,h=h)
  dPrime <- function(x) {((fPrime(x+h)-fPrime(x))/h)} # OR myD(fPrime, h=h)
  return(dPrime)
}

```

#3 Returns number(x) when inputted into the derivative
``` {r}
otherD <- function(f,x) {
  h <- .0000001
  res <- (f(x+h)-f(x))/h
  return(res)
  }
```
